com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine

Class WorldB2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.World
      • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.WorldB2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, ActiveInterface

    public abstract class WorldB2D
extends World
    Box2D version of World. Use instead of World if you want to use Box2D. This is basically a manager for the actual Box2D World class to allow unified functionality between this and the standard 0Bit World class.
